page.title: 18Clubs at Sandhills
page.content: The Monday Club is a club for old people to meet. They play bingo, have raffles,people to sing and show slides. Most people who go come from Sandhills. They have been meeting for 5 years. 32-34 people go and more ladies go than men. They come to the school to watch Christmas concerts etc. They also go out and see places. Play Group The Sandhills Play Group is at the end of the school. The children come in at the age of 3 and go to school when they are 5. The play group has been there since 1974. Toddler Group There is a seperate toddler group for under 3's,which meet 1 afternoon a week. W.I. The W.I. has just recently closed.
